title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 45.2 - Definitions
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 45.2 - Definitions

State Regulations
(a) Medical care for cystic fibrosis means such diagnostic, therapeutic and rehabilitative care by medical and paramedical personnel, including hospital and related care, drugs, prostheses, appliances, procedures, equipment and devices, as necessary for the treatment of cystic fibrosis and any conditions demonstrated to result from the progress or treatment of cystic fibrosis. (b) Net annual income means gross income of the patient and/or patient's spouse, less State, local and Federal income taxes, and social security deductions. Notes

45.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
